abstract: Norsk Hydro shares fell slightly in midmorning trading Monday after the Norwegian aluminum maker announced a cash-and-share deal of nearly $5 billion on Sunday for Vale’s aluminum mining business in Brazil, a purchase it said would assure access to the material for the next century.

lead_paragraph: Norsk Hydro shares fell slightly in midmorning trading Monday after the Norwegian aluminum maker announced a cash-and-share deal of nearly $5 billion on Sunday for Vale‘s aluminum mining business in Brazil, a purchase it said would assure access to the material for the next century.

headline.main: Norsk Hydro to Buy Vale Assets for $4.9 Billion
